languages.text: Один из провидцев оказался пленником очередного эксперимента гемункула — судьба его печальна и беспощадна.

traits.locale_text: Один из провидцев оказался пленником очередного эксперимента гемункула — судьба его печальна и беспощадна.

languages.text: One of the Farseers turned out to be a prisoner of another experiment of the Haemonculus — his fate is sad and merciless.
languages.original_text: Один из провидцев оказался пленником очередного эксперимента гемункула — судьба его печальна и беспощадна.

traits.locale_text: One of the seers turned out to be a prisoner of another experiment of the Haemonculus — his fate is sad and merciless.
One of the Farseers turned out to be a prisoner of another experiment of the Haemonculus — his fate is sad and merciless.
One of the Farseers turned out to be a prisoner of another experiment of the Haemonculus — his fate is sad and merciless.

languages.text: L'un des Grands Prophètes était prisonnier d'une autre expérience de l'hémoncule. Il a connu un sort triste et cruel.
languages.original_text: One of the Farseers turned out to be a prisoner of another experiment of the Haemonculus — his fate is sad and merciless.

traits.locale_text: L'un des Grands Prophètes était prisonnier d'une autre expérience de l'hémoncule. Il a connu un sort triste et cruel.

languages.text: 其中一名先知沦为了血伶人痛苦实验的囚犯，面对着悲惨而无情的命运。
languages.original_text: One of the Farseers turned out to be a prisoner of another experiment of the Haemonculus — his fate is sad and merciless.

traits.locale_text: 其中一名先知沦为了血伶人痛苦实验的囚犯，面对着悲惨而无情的命运。

languages.text: 先見司の1人は、ハモンキュラスの別の実験用囚人であることが判明した。その運命は悲惨かつ残忍なものである。
languages.original_text: One of the Farseers turned out to be a prisoner of another experiment of the Haemonculus — his fate is sad and merciless.

traits.locale_text: 先見司の1人は、ハモンキュラスの別の実験用囚人であることが判明した。その運命は悲惨かつ残忍なものである。

languages.text: Es hat sich gezeigt, dass einer der Runenpropheten in einem weiteren Experiment des Haemonculus gefangen war. Sein Schicksal ist traurig und gnadenlos.
languages.original_text: One of the Farseers turned out to be a prisoner of another experiment of the Haemonculus — his fate is sad and merciless.

traits.locale_text: Es hat sich gezeigt, dass einer der Runenpropheten in einem weiteren Experiment des Haemonculus gefangen war. Sein Schicksal ist traurig und gnadenlos.

languages.text: Uno de los videntes estaba prisionero de otro de los experimentos del Hemónculo. Un destino triste y despiadado.
languages.original_text: One of the Farseers turned out to be a prisoner of another experiment of the Haemonculus — his fate is sad and merciless.

traits.locale_text: Uno de los videntes estaba prisionero de otro de los experimentos del Hemónculo. Un destino triste y despiadado.

languages.text: Ötesezenlerden biri, Haimonkulus'un başka bir deneyine kurban olmuş. Kaderi hüzünlü ve acımasız.
languages.original_text: One of the Farseers turned out to be a prisoner of another experiment of the Haemonculus — his fate is sad and merciless.
